sourcesContent:
Welcome to Our Accessible Website

Key Features

Accessible Navigation

Fully keyboard-accessible navigation with ARIA labels and skip links.

Semantic HTML

Properly structured content using semantic HTML elements.

Get Started

  • Option 1
  • Option 2
  • Option 3
Skip to main content Skip to featured products Skip to product categories Skip to special deals Skip to shopping cart

Accessible Shopping Experience

Discover our range of accessible products designed for everyone

Type to search products and press Enter

Featured Products

{{product.description}}

Your cart is empty

Stay Updated

We'll never share your email with anyone else
import { Component, OnInit, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; interface Product { id: string; name: string; description: string; price: number; image: string; imageAlt: string; rating: number; } interface CartItem extends Product { quantity: number; } interface Category { id: string; name: string; description: string; icon: string; itemCount: number; } interface Deal { id: string; name: string; description: string; originalPrice: number; discount: number; image: string; imageAlt: string; dealPrice: number; } @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { isDropdownOpen = false; selectedOption = ''; currentAnnouncement = 'Welcome to our accessible website! Press "/" to use quick search.'; searchQuery = ''; cartItems: CartItem[] = []; currentDealIndex = 0; newsletterEmail = ''; featuredProducts: Product[] = [ { id: 'ergonomic-keyboard', name: 'Ergonomic Keyboard', description: 'High-contrast keys with adjustable height', price: 89.99, image: 'assets/images/keyboard.jpg', imageAlt: 'High-contrast ergonomic keyboard with adjustable tilt', rating: 4.5 }, { id: 'adaptive-mouse', name: 'Adaptive Mouse', description: 'Customizable buttons and smooth tracking', price: 65.99, image: 'assets/images/mouse.jpg', imageAlt: 'Adaptive mouse with programmable buttons', rating: 4.8 }, { id: 'screen-reader', name: 'Screen Reader Pro', description: 'Advanced screen reader with natural voice', price: 199.99, image: 'assets/images/screen-reader.jpg', imageAlt: 'Screen reader software interface', rating: 4.9 } ]; categories: Category[] = [ { id: 'input-devices', name: 'Input Devices', description: 'Keyboards, mice, and alternative input solutions', icon: 'âŒ¨ï¸', itemCount: 15 }, { id: 'visual-aids', name: 'Visual Aids', description: 'Screen magnifiers and color enhancement tools', icon: 'ðŸ”', itemCount: 8 }, { id: 'audio', name: 'Audio Solutions', description: 'Screen readers and audio enhancement tools', icon: 'ðŸ”Š', itemCount: 12 } ]; deals: Deal[] = [ { id: 'deal1', name: 'Ergonomic Bundle', description: 'Keyboard and mouse combo for optimal comfort', originalPrice: 154.98, discount: 20, image: 'assets/images/bundle.jpg', imageAlt: 'Ergonomic keyboard and mouse bundle', dealPrice: 123.98 }, { id: 'deal2', name: 'Screen Reader Pro', description: 'Advanced screen reader with voice commands', originalPrice: 199.99, discount: 15, image: 'assets/images/screen-reader.jpg', imageAlt: 'Screen reader software interface', dealPrice: 169.99 } ]; constructor(private router: Router) {} ngOnInit() { // Show initial announcement for 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { if (this.currentAnnouncement.includes('Welcome')) { this.currentAnnouncement = ''; } }, 5000); // Initialize with a welcome announcement this.announceToScreenReader('Welcome to our accessible shopping experience'); } get cartSubtotal(): number { return this.cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); } get cartTax(): number { return this.cartSubtotal * 0.1; } get cartTotal(): number { return this.cartSubtotal + this.cartTax; } onSearch(): void { if (this.searchQuery.length > 2) { this.announceToScreenReader(`Searching for ${this.searchQuery}`); // Implement search logic } } addToCart(product: Product): void { const existingItem = this.cartItems.find(item => item.id === product.id); if (existingItem) { existingItem.quantity += 1; this.announceToScreenReader(`Increased quantity of ${product.name} in cart`); } else { this.cartItems.push({ ...product, quantity: 1 }); this.announceToScreenReader(`Added ${product.name} to cart`); } } removeFromCart(item: CartItem): void { const index = this.cartItems.indexOf(item); if (index > -1) { this.cartItems.splice(index, 1); this.announceToScreenReader(`Removed ${item.name} from cart`); } } increaseQuantity(item: CartItem): void { item.quantity += 1; this.announceToScreenReader(`Increased quantity of ${item.name} to ${item.quantity}`); } decreaseQuantity(item: CartItem): void { if (item.quantity > 1) { item.quantity -= 1; this.announceToScreenReader(`Decreased quantity of ${item.name} to ${item.quantity}`); } } checkout(): void { if (this.cartItems.length > 0) { this.announceToScreenReader('Proceeding to checkout'); // Implement checkout logic } } selectCategory(category: Category): void { this.announceToScreenReader(`Selected category: ${category.name}`); this.router.navigate(['/products'], { queryParams: { category: category.id } }); } previousDeal(): void { this.currentDealIndex = this.currentDealIndex === 0 ? this.deals.length - 1 : this.currentDealIndex - 1; this.announceToScreenReader(`Showing deal: ${this.deals[this.currentDealIndex].name}`); } nextDeal(): void { this.currentDealIndex = (this.currentDealIndex + 1) % this.deals.length; this.announceToScreenReader(`Showing deal: ${this.deals[this.currentDealIndex].name}`); } goToDeal(index: number): void { this.currentDealIndex = index; this.announceToScreenReader(`Showing deal: ${this.deals[this.currentDealIndex].name}`); } subscribeNewsletter(): void { if (this.newsletterEmail) { this.announceToScreenReader('Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter'); // Implement newsletter subscription logic this.newsletterEmail = ''; } } @HostListener('window:keydown', ['$event']) handleKeyboardEvent(event: KeyboardEvent): void { // Quick search shortcut if (event.key === '/' && !this.isDropdownOpen) { event.preventDefault(); this.currentAnnouncement = 'Quick search activated'; // Implement quick search functionality here } // Escape key handling if (event.key === 'Escape') { if (this.isDropdownOpen) { this.toggleDropdown(); } if (this.currentAnnouncement) { this.dismissAnnouncement(); } } // Handle keyboard navigation for carousel if (event.key === 'ArrowLeft' && event.altKey) { event.preventDefault(); this.previousDeal(); } else if (event.key === 'ArrowRight' && event.altKey) { event.preventDefault(); this.nextDeal(); } } dismissAnnouncement(): void { this.currentAnnouncement = ''; } navigateToProducts(): void { this.router.navigate(['/products']); } toggleDropdown(): void { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; // Announce to screen readers this.announceToScreenReader( this.isDropdownOpen ? 'Dropdown menu opened' : 'Dropdown menu closed' ); } selectOption(option: string): void { this.selectedOption = option; this.isDropdownOpen = false; this.announceToScreenReader(`Selected option: ${option}`); } private announceToScreenReader(message: string): void { const announcement = document.createElement('div'); announcement.setAttribute('aria-live', 'polite'); announcement.setAttribute('class', 'sr-only'); announcement.textContent = message; document.body.appendChild(announcement); setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(announcement), 1000); } // Close dropdown when clicking outside onDocumentClick(event: MouseEvent): void { if (!(event.target as HTMLElement).closest('.custom-dropdown')) { this.isDropdownOpen = false; } } }
